content: संभू {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To arise, to be born or produced, spring up; कथमपि भुवनेऽस्मिंस्तादृशाः संभवंति <ls>Māl. 2. 9</ls>; धर्मसंस्थापनार्थाय संभवामि युगे युगे <ls>Bg. 4. 8</ls>; <ls>Ki. 5. 22</ls>; <ls>Bk. 6. 138</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 155.</ls> {@--2@} To be, become, exist. {@--3@} To happen, occur, take place. {@--4@} To be possible. {@--5@} To be adequate for, be competent for (with <ab>inf.</ab>); न यन्नियंतुं समभावि भानुना <ls>Śi. 1. 27.</ls> {@--6@} To meet, be united or joined with; संभूयांभोधिमभ्येति महानद्या नगापगा <ls>Śi. 2. 100</ls>; संभूयेव सुखानि चेतसि <ls>Māl. 5. 9</ls>, <ls n="Māl. 5.">18.</ls> {@--7@} To be consistent. {@--8@} To have sexual intercourse with. {@--9@} To be capable of existing in, be contained in. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To produce, effect, make. {@--2@} To imagine, conceive, fancy, think. {@--3@} To guess or conjecture; <ls>Ś. 2.</ls> {@--4@} To consider, regard. {@--5@} To honour, respect, esteem, show respect to; प्राप्तोऽसि संभावयितुं वनान्मां <ls>R. 5. 11</ls>; <ls n="R.">7. 8.</ls> {@--6@} To honour or present with, treat with; <ls>Ku. 3. 37.</ls> {@--7@} To ascribe or impute to; <ls>Mk. 1. 36.</ls> {@--8@} To come or go to, approach. {@--9@} To take part in, enjoy; <ls>U. 4.</ls> {@--10@} To greet, salute. {@--11@} To manifest, exhibit. {@--12@} To expect. {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} of {%<ab>caus.</ab>%} To be possible; कथमेतद्भवति संभाव्यते <ls>Ś. 2.</ls>
